entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
